page.title: 18LEISURE TIME
page.content: Saturday is one of the most popular days of the week.Most people go down to the town with friends,if not they go out with their parents to large shopping centres like Brighton or Eastbourne. On Saturday night many people attend the Roller-Disco,costing 1.20p and lasting 1hr.45mins.Saturday night is also a good night for watching the T.V. Some favourite programmes are Dallas and Dynasty,which are soap operas. Not many young people find Sundays interesting because there aren't many programmes on the T.V.,and there are few shops open. So most people either visit places with their families, such as castles, National Trust properties or places of historic interest.Also they go to see their relatives and friends.
